name: Hawaiian
description: Hawaiian is a mostly sativa hybrid that will give you a happy, vacation feeling. Creative but not so focused, this bud is great for a relaxing day. These light green buds have a sweet smell and taste that is not super potent but will bring to mind fresh tropical fruit.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Relaxed, Creative, Talkative, Stress, Depression, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Anxious, Dry Eyes, Dizzy
